markdownRemark.html:
Open Augmented Reality (AR) Ecosystems

For AR headset owners who are dissatisfied with the amount of AR content on closed corporate ecosystems, and creators who want their AR models to be discovered by more people, Blocktag lets anyone use their home printer as a factory to print security tags as secure Augmented Reality (AR) markers and stick them at public spaces. Unlike QR based markers, Blocktag protects the copyrights of creators as consumers have to use their phone or headset camera to authenticate the tag and their identity to trigger AR experiences.

How To Use

Activate secure AR experiences using Blocktag tags as reference markers at physical locations or on physical things e.g. machine servicing.

3D Model Copyright Protection

Tags can also be used to detect unauthorised 3D scans of tagged physical models like machine parts or sculptures.
